SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, pd_order_tb_no , customer_tb_no , pd_order_tb_order_date , pd_order_tb_payment , pd_order_tb_state , pd_order_tb_address , pd_order_tb_ad_city , pd_order_tb_receiver , pd_order_tb_payment_date , pd_order_tb_phone , pd_order_tb_delivery_fee , pd_order_tb_used_point, pd_sale_tb_product_name, order_product_count FROM ( SELECT po.PD_ORDER_TB_NO , po.CUSTOMER_TB_NO , po.PD_ORDER_TB_ORDER_DATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT , po.PD_ORDER_TB_STATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_ADDRESS , po.PD_ORDER_TB_AD_CITY , po.PD_ORDER_TB_RECEIVER , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PAYMENT_DATE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_PHONE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_DELIVERY_FEE , po.PD_ORDER_TB_USED_POINT, odn.pd_sale_tb_product_name, odc.order_product_count FROM pd_order po, (SELECT pd_sale_tb_product_name FROM pd_sale WHERE pd_sale_tb_no = (SELECT MIN(od.pd_sale_tb_no) KEEP(DENSE_RANK LAST ORDER BY od.orders_detail_tb_no DESC) FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no)) odn, (SELECT po.pd_order_tb_no, COUNT(*) order_product_count FROM pd_order po, orders_detail od WHERE po.pd_order_tb_no = od.pd_order_tb_no AND po.customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo} GROUP BY po.pd_order_tb_no) odc WHERE customer_tb_no = #{customerTbNo} AND po.pd_order_tb_no = odc.pd_order_tb_no ORDER BY pd_order_tb_no DESC)) WHERE rnum >= #{startRow} AND rnum <= #{endRow}
